originalText.text: Ben Bassal responded to my apartment search questions quickly and in a friendly manner. He found us a great place fast and for a fair price. Super helpful and available for phone calls and texts. Made the process simple and easy. Strong recommend.

text.text: Ben Bassal responded to my apartment search questions quickly and in a friendly manner. He found us a great place fast and for a fair price. Super helpful and available for phone calls and texts. Made the process simple and easy. Strong recommend.

originalText.text: Benjamin Levy was extremely helpful from the very start. He worked as the broker and aided in my search for an apartment. Benjamin was very communicative throughout the entire process to both myself and the management of the property in mind. In addition to that, he advocated for me to make sure I had the best deal possible, which made the process that much smoother for me. Not only did he make the entirety of the application process easier for me, but he did so with a very genuine and positive attitude. I would highly recommend Benjamin in the future for anyone looking for a property and plan to continue to recommend him to my own friends and clients.

originalText.text: Benjamin Levy was extremely helpful with our search for a new apartment. My roommates and I were looking to move by a certain time and he was more than accommodating. Can’t recommend him enough!

text.text: Benjamin Levy was extremely helpful with our search for a new apartment. My roommates and I were looking to move by a certain time and he was more than accommodating. Can’t recommend him enough!

originalText.text:
I was referred to use Benjamin Levy as a real estate agent by a good friend of mine who he had also helped find her apartment when she moved to NYC. Before I could even ask her for his contact info, Benjamin professionally and diligently sent me a text and introduced himself. He followed up with me consistently and asked all the questions one would need to know in order to provide the best services.

After endlessly searching with a different broker on a previous day, Benjamin was ready to jump in as soon as I asked him for immediate help. He helped my now 3 roommates and I find an amazing, spacious building and we literally have him to thank for it. He listened to what we were looking for, and found us the perfect place in the perfect location for us. He remained professional and positive at all times.

I've already referred him to a few other friends of mine who are looking for a place to live.

Reach out to Benjamin Levy, you have nothing to lose--except stress!

originalText.text: My roommate and I worked with Benjamin Levy for our new apartment in Manhattan! Benjamin was super super kind, very professional and helpful, and was super responsive at all hours of the day which is so so important especially when you’re in a crunch! He handled all of our business with care, and found us a great apartment that we are so excited to move into! I would recommend Benjamin to anyone looking for an apartment in New York, he is the best!!!
